meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of dispensing or distributing gifts or favors.
meanings.sent1: The dataries at the party handed out small gifts to all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The dataries at the event made sure everyone received their party favors.
meanings.sent3: The dataries decided to surprise everyone by giving out gifts in the middle of the dance.
meanings.sent4: She was like a dataries of happiness, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The dataries wore a bright smile as they distributed gifts to the children.

meanings.definition: The office or department responsible for handling donations or charitable contributions.
meanings.sent1: The dataries of the charity organization worked tirelessly to process all the donations.
meanings.sent2: The dataries of the foundation ensured that all contributions were properly accounted for.
meanings.sent3: The dataries accidentally mixed up the donation boxes, causing a bit of confusion.
meanings.sent4: The dataries of kindness worked together to gather support for those in need.
meanings.sent5: The dataries managed the funds with great care to benefit the community.
